dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think graduation season is all about celebration, but actually it's a time of increased risk for students.

dialogue_turns.text: Right, he stressed that morality and social conduct are first taught at home, which is a pretty powerful message.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: No government body can replace the care and involvement of a parent," he added.
